scripts.build-web: lerna bootstrap && (cd web && npm run build)
scripts.build-studio: lerna bootstrap && (cd studio && npm run build)
scripts.deploy: yarn run build && netlify deploy --dir=./web/out --site=2d77298f-d617-46a9-9ecb-4dafc8c8976f --prod && netlify deploy --dir=./studio/dist --site=860969ea-617a-4d97-9887-f54ea6c290aa --prod
